title.narrative: Providing sub-grants to Community-Based Organizations to advance their advocacy activities

description.narrative: In the first quarter of 2018, WEP completed the process of engaging civil society organizations who will benefit from sub-grants to carry out advocacy activities in Benue and Nasarawa State. The eight (8) organisations that emerged for sub-granting are: Environment and Climate Change Amelioration Initiative (ECCAI); Nigerian Association of Women in Agriculture (NAWIA); Initiative for Women’s Health Development and Right Protection (WRAHI); and Community Links and Human Empowerment Initiative (CLHEI) from Benue State. While Zamfara CSOs are Life Helpers Initiative (LHI), Voluntary Aid Initiative (VAI), Millennium Development Centre (MDC) and Future Hope Foundation (FHF). Detail report of the process leading to the selection of these organizations can be found on this link - https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_Uo7tmHW2XgCYxewo3KXRuARBuJnNi6L

activity-date.narrative: First quarter of 2018 was used to select eligible organizations that will benefit from the sub-grants

recipient-country.narrative: This action covers Benue and Zamfara States of Nigeria

sector.narrative: This fund is for the advancement of the rights of women
